dt-option.name: language.stateRestore.creationModal.select
dt-option.summary: Set the text for the label of the `-init select` checkbox within the creation modal

type.description: The string that will be displayed within the label next to the checkbox for `-init select` that is shown in the creation modal when enabled within `-init stateRestore.creationModal`.

dt-option.description:
This string is displayed in the label next to the checkbox that allows toggling of `-init select` state saving within the creation modal that is shown when a state is being created.
The value set here is passed through the `-api i18n()` function.

example.title: Change text of the select checkbox label
